message:
SYSTEM: BNE-UPMLinkedData2.pdf: Página 2
Project background
• Cooperation project between BNE and national and 
regional libraries of Spain
• GOAL: Create a Unified Authority System (similar to 
VIAF approach)
• MAIN ISSUE: Multilinguality
• Various approaches were analysed and tested, but 
were not succesful
speaker: SYSTEM
